Word.Root: To toil, exert, make every effort to carry out a thing, labor hard and actively, toil hard, labouring, laboriously, one who labours.
Word.MeaningSimple: To toil, work hard towards a goal.

Meaning.Definition: كَدَحَ aor. يَكْدَحُ inf noun كَدْحًا . He worked, laboured employed himself actively; he strove, exerted and wearied himself in work; he toiled hard towards his lord. كَادِحٌ : Act. part.
